Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Dist. No. 10 -- 13 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 10 of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of thirteen (13) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,781,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of acquiring and constructing additional classrooms for public schools in the District and for giving additional support for constructing, improving, maintaining and operating public schools and school related facilities in the District, including payment of salaries of teachers and other school system employees?
